item.title: Southern Utah Half-Day ATV Tour
item.description: Roar through Utah’s desert landscapes on an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) on this half-day adventure in Sand Hollow State Park near St. George, with instruction and equipment provided—you just show up and ride. Don the supplied helmet, drive your own ATV, and follow a guide through dunes, canyons, and up to 3,500 feet (1,066 meters) for panoramic lake-and-mountain views. The tour is suitable for all abilities, experienced or otherwise.

image.alt: Southern Utah Half-Day ATV Tour

item.title: Sand Hollow ATV Rentals - New 4 Person UTV Bring up to 4 People Per Machine
item.description: Rent an ATV which can fit up to 4 people, and get out and explore St George, near Sand Hollow, in Hurricane, Utah. Ride over the sand dunes at Sand Hollow State Park, checking out the mountainous scenery and the valley. Then stop off at Sand Hollow Reservoir and Quail Creek Reservoir to cool off with a swim in the lakes.

image.alt: Sand Hollow ATV Rentals - New 4 Person UTV Bring up to 4 People Per Machine

item.title: Zion Full Day Private Tour & Hike
item.description: Take a tour and hike in Zion National Park, designed especially with your interests and abilities in mind. Our guides are naturalists educated in Outdoor and Sustainability Education ready to open up a world of human and geological history, unique flora and fauna, and soaring red cliffs. During your hike, you'll enjoy a tasty picnic lunch. During the busy season, your group and guide will use the park's required shuttle system to get around.

image.alt: Zion Full Day Private Tour & Hike

item.title: Greater Zion: Sand Hollow Dunes ATV Tour
item.description: Outdoor enthusiasts can go off-road and explore the Utah desert on this guided, all-terrain vehicle tour. Start your day by meeting-up in Sand Hollow State Park for an adrenaline-fueled ride through the sand dunes. You can rent a vehicle for up to four people, get behind the wheel, and follow your guide to explore the red rock landscape.

image.alt: Greater Zion: Sand Hollow Dunes ATV Tour

item.title: E-Bike Rental
item.description: Experience stunning Zion National Park at your own pace and schedule during this full-day or multi-day e-bike rental. Foldable models can be easily stored in an SUV or truck and taken on the go. For smaller vehicles, bikes can be delivered to your hotel or campsite. Helmets and bike locks are provided. Upgrade to include a half-day e-bike tour to discover the Greater Zion area with a guide.

image.alt: E-Bike Rental

item.title: Greater Zion: UTV Surf and Dune Ride at Sand Hollow Dunes
item.description: Get your adrenaline pumping while surrounded by beautiful landscapes as you safely explore Sand Hollow Dunes. You’ll get to tear across the dramatic red sand dunes on a UTV and surf down them, flying through the sand. This guided adventure will take you to viewpoints like the Top of the World with incredible canyon vistas and to see dinosaur tracks and ancient petroglyphs in between off-roading.

image.alt: Greater Zion: UTV Surf and Dune Ride at Sand Hollow Dunes

item.title: Sand Hollow ATV Tour Private up to 4 people per vehicle
item.description: Take on the dunes of Sand Hollow State Park and get stunning views of this remarkable southern Utah landscape during a private ATV tour. Explore sites in the park including the crystal-strewn Glitter Mountain, Sand Hollow Reservoir, and the Flintstone House rock formation. This flexible tour can accommodate any group size and any experience level, from beginner to extreme.

image.alt: Sand Hollow ATV Tour Private up to 4 people per vehicle

item.title: Southern Utah Full-Day ATV Tour
item.description: Cover more ground of Utah’s San Hollow State Park than you would on a walking tour with this ATV full-day tour. With use of an ATV and helmet, you’ll follow a guide around up to 30 miles (48 kilometers) of the park as you stop to take in views and snap photos. You’ll also catch views of Zion National Park, and lunch is provided for a stress-free day.

image.alt: Southern Utah Full-Day ATV Tour

item.title: Dark Sky UTV Tour with Stargazing in Greater Zion
item.description: Enjoy a memorable way to explore one of Utah’s newest state parks: this dune buggy excursion takes you past the red sandstone landscapes of Sand Hollow State Park. Make your own way to the departure point in Hurricane, get acquainted with your vehicle, and follow your guide to local landmarks like Flintstone House and Patriot Rock. You’ll set off right in time to catch the sunset over the rugged scenery.

image.alt: Dark Sky UTV Tour with Stargazing in Greater Zion

item.title: Greater Zion: Extreme UTV Rock Crawling Tour
item.description: Take in the extraordinary red sandstone scenery of Utah’s Sand Hollow State Park on this private ATV tour of the park’s West Rim. You’ll traverse high hills and challenging trails with a guide who can teach you how to maneuver the vehicle through obstacles and difficult terrain. This unique Utah landscape offers a thrilling ATV adventure for drivers of any level.

image.alt: Greater Zion: Extreme UTV Rock Crawling Tour

item.title: Half-Day Sunset ATV Tour
item.description: Explore the rugged landscape outside Zion National Park on a 3.5-hour, ATV tour through the Red Rock Desert. Learn the basics of ATV handling and safety, then follow your experienced guide through box canyons, mountain trails and sand dunes. Climb to 3500 feet (1066 meters) for sweeping views of the desert while swooping and soaring across the sand. Get far off the beaten track with a back country adventure that’s suited for all ages and skill levels, and experience the Utah wilderness at its very best.

image.alt: Half-Day Sunset ATV Tour

item.title: Hot Air Balloon Adventure In Beautiful Southern Utah
item.description: We are proud to offer the newest and largest balloons in St. George that can accommodate up to 8+passengers. Larger groups welcome, please message us for details. Enjoy the peaceful ride and outstanding views alongside your friends and family. This is the perfect way to celebrate a birthday, engagement, anniversary or any other special occasion. We promise to make your flight one to remember. Each magical flight includes sparkling cider to toast post flight and bottled waters, we aim to please and will go above and beyond for you. See for yourself why Zion Balloons has the best views in Southern Utah!

image.alt: Hot Air Balloon Adventure In Beautiful Southern Utah

item.title: Sand Hollow Boat Rentals - Quail Creek Wake Boat Rentals
item.description: Get up to 14 of your friends and family on a beautiful, new, rental water boat where you can do watersports on the wake in Sand Hollow Reservoir or Quail Creek. All ages can take this ride, and you can choose what you’d like to do, be it watersports (3 included), swimming, touring the lake, or just relaxing.

image.alt: Sand Hollow Boat Rentals - Quail Creek Wake Boat Rentals

item.title: Sand Hollow Boat Charter for 3 Hours
item.description: Experience Utah’s Sand Hollow State Park from the water and pick up some new skills with this action-packed water sports charter tour. You’ll spend around three hours cruising the reservoir in an 18-passenger surf boat. The tour includes a choice of any three water toys, such as wakeboards, skis, tubes, and water trampolines, and an instructor to help you learn to use them.

image.alt: Sand Hollow Boat Charter for 3 Hours

item.title: Greater Zion: UTV Tour to Toquerville Falls
item.description: Get off-road access to rugged locations within Sand Hollow State Park during this fast-paced ATV tour. Enjoy a private excursion, unique to you and your travel companions, without the rush of a shared excursion. Race up and down sand dunes and whip over the park’s rocky hills and terrain, admiring postcard-perfect sunset panoramas along the way.

image.alt: Greater Zion: UTV Tour to Toquerville Falls

item.title: Greater Zion: Sunset UTV Tour at Sand Hollow
item.description: Take a four-hour tour over the dunes of Sand Hollow State Park with this off-road experience. Your professional guide will take you out to explore the dunes, taking you to some of the most incredible areas of the park, including Patriot Rock, the Flintstone House, and the Top of the World.

image.alt: Greater Zion: Sunset UTV Tour at Sand Hollow

item.title: Sand Hollow Jet Ski Rentals - Quail Creek Reservoir Waverunner Adventure
item.description: Experience this jet ski experience on Sand Hollow Reservoir and Quail Creek Reservoir in Hurricane and St. George, Utah. Ride the waves, or for an additional cost, you can do water sports like wakeboarding, kneeboarding, and tubing. You can go at any time of day, morning until sunset, depending on your needs.

image.alt: Sand Hollow Jet Ski Rentals - Quail Creek Reservoir Waverunner Adventure

item.title: Guided Mountain Bike Tours - Zion
item.description: We believe that mountain biking is for everyone. Our 3 hour guided mountain bike trip is a great activity for kids and families, and perfect for beginners and even advanced riders. We tailor each trip to group and individual skill level, whether you are learning to mountain bike for your first time or a seasoned rider.

image.alt: Guided Mountain Bike Tours - Zion

item.title: Candy Cliffs in Saint George Utah
item.description: Explore the colorful cliffs of Yant Flat near St. George Utah on this hiking excursion. With a small group, embark on a moderately-difficult trek through the unique, arid landscapes. Catch views of Zion National Park in the distance and learn about the multi-colored striations of Navajo sandstone that have been pushed up by volcanic rock.

image.alt: Candy Cliffs in Saint George Utah

item.title: Early Morning Sunrise UTV Tour in Greater Zion
item.description: Experience the thrills of riding an ATV through the extreme desert terrain of Sand Hollow State Park with private guided tour. With a guide to coach you through through riding over different terrain and obstacles, ride over Horseshoe Bend, Box Canyon, Top of the World, Cliffs of Insanity, and more. All equipment provided.

image.alt: Early Morning Sunrise UTV Tour in Greater Zion

item.title: Greater Zion: UTV Tour through The Squeeze
item.description: Drivers of any level can have fun and get some thrills on this private guided ATV tour of Utah’s Sand Hollow State Park. With coaching from your guide, you’ll pilot your ATV through the challenging terrain of the park’s West Rim, taking on high hills and driving among the rock formations. You’ll spend around two hours getting to know this unique red sandstone landscape.

image.alt: Greater Zion: UTV Tour through The Squeeze

item.title: Greater Zion: Dinosaur Tracks in the Desert UTV Tour
item.description:
Explore the hidden wonders of Greater Zion on a UTV tour. Discover ancient secrets and lesser-known treasures tucked away in the desert landscapes of Sand Hollow and beyond. See dinosaur tracks, visit ancient caves, and learn about the area's rich history and geology from expert guides.
Starting near the breathtaking Sand Hollow State Park, climb aboard a state-of-the-art UTV, ready for an off-road journey through the rugged desert. Navigate through sandy paths, up and over expansive sand dunes, and into secluded areas where history comes to life.

image.alt: Greater Zion: Dinosaur Tracks in the Desert UTV Tour

item.title: Exploring the Historic Hurricane Canal
item.description: This is a tour that has never been offered until now. Guided tours along the Hurricane Canal, to date, have only been a once-a-year offering. Participants on this tour see things most tourists pass over. People of all ages enjoy encountering the canal and its tunnels and flumes, which makes it not a typical hike. This tour is enlightening look at what it took to settle the land in the American West. These hardy settlers had to build irrigation systems in order to establish their communities and the Hurricane Canal was one of the toughest ones to build. It took 12 years to build and was mostly a pick-and-shovel operation with no public financing. It is an engineering marvel of its time and truly a miracle because as one looks at some sections of the canal, they seem to run uphill.

image.alt: Exploring the Historic Hurricane Canal

item.title: Greater Zion: Epic Box Canyon UTV Tour
item.description:
Embark on an epic off-road adventure through Southern Utah's stunning red rock landscapes! Our Epic Box Canyon UTV Tour takes you deep into a breathtaking canyon where towering red rock walls surround you, and a massive sand hill obstacle awaits. Located near Hurricane, Utah, this tour combines adrenaline-pumping UTV action and awe-inspiring natural beauty.
Feel the thrill as you drive your UTV through the rugged terrain, conquering the massive sand hill and exploring the hidden wonders of Box Canyon. Whether you're an off-road enthusiast or simply looking for an unforgettable adventure with friends, this tour delivers an experience you'll be talking about for years to come.

image.alt: Greater Zion: Epic Box Canyon UTV Tour
